c74object.name: dynamic.out~
c74object.digest: The functionality of out~ within dynamicdsp~ or dynamicserial~
c74object.description: dynamic.out~ acts like out~ but for patchers loaded inside a dynamicdsp~ or dynamicserial~ object. Unlike out~ the user can change the signal outlet which the object refers to by sending an int to the object.

objarg.name: initial-outlet
objarg.description:
Set the inial outlet to attach to when inside a dynamicdsp~ or dynamicserial~.
Default is 0 (off).

method.name: outlet
method.description: Sending an int to the first inlet sets the outlet to attach to when inside a dynamicdsp~ or dynamicserial~.

entry.name: signal
entry.description: dynamic.out~ has no outlet. It is used to output a signal from the dynamicdsp~ or dynamicserial~ that it is inside, from the outlet specified by the argument or int input.
